Fiesta was founded along the banks of the Ohio River, in a region known for rich deposits of clay. The way Fiesta looks, feels and lasts is still rooted in our clay. There’s a purity to it that defines a piece of dinnerware as Fiesta. Our clay is the core of Fiesta, unseen but not unnoticed.
